name: ng-country-select
description: A smart, multilingual country search with flags and codes
author: Wilfried Lucha <wilfried@lucha.at>

scripts.publish:patch: npm --prefix projects/wlucha/ng-country-select version patch -m "Upgrade to %s " && npm run publish && npm run gh-deploy
scripts.publish:minor: npm --prefix projects/wlucha/ng-country-select version minor -m "Upgrade to %s " && npm run publish && npm run gh-deploy
scripts.publish:major: npm --prefix projects/wlucha/ng-country-select version major -m "Upgrade to %s " && npm run publish && npm run gh-deploy
scripts.publish: npm run build:lib && npm run build:schematics && npm run cpy:readme && cd dist/wlucha/ng-country-select && npm publish
scripts.publish:test: npm --prefix projects/wlucha/ng-country-select version patch && npm run build:lib && npm run build:schematics && npm run cpy:readme && cd dist/wlucha/ng-country-select && npm publish --registry http://localhost:4873/
